title: Modular Architecture for High-Performance and Low-Overhead Data Transfers
description: Source code and experiments for AutoMDT, a DRL-driven optimizer that jointly tunes read, network and write concurrency. Offline-trained with a custom I/O-network simulator it converges in ~45 min and cuts transfer time by up to 68 %. Companion artifact for INDIS @ SC â€™25.
